name: Angry
alt: Becca with a fist raised, her face red from anger
description: It does not take much to outrage Becca.

name: Art
alt: Becca with a beret on her head, paintbrushes and paint pallet in hand
description: She does have an artistic side.

name: Ban
alt: Becca with devil horns and red eyes, holding a massive wooden mallet.
description: Play by her rules or get bonked.

name: Blush
alt: Becca blushing from embarrassment, her mouth open in surprise.
description: What did you say to finally get her to blush?

name: Cheer
alt: Becca smiling, a pompom in each hand.
description: She'll cheer you on - as long as you are doing what she wants.

name: Cry
alt: Becca crying, tears streaming down her face.
description: It takes a lot to make her cry. She's not one to show vulnerability.

name: Drunk
alt: Becca drinking from a large bottle of alcohol.
description: She loves a good party. Good parties have booze.

name: Facepalm
alt: Becca with her hand on her face, frustrated.
description: You probably did something silly again.

name: Heart
alt: Becca smiling, her hands in the shape of a heart.
description: She really only does this with Rosalia. You are lucky to have seen it.

name: Hello
alt: Becca waving and saying 'Hey!'
description: There are a few people that Becca gets excited to see.

name: Huh
alt: Becca tilting her head, a confused expression on her face.
description: Sometimes she just doesn't understand.

name: Laugh
alt: Becca with her hand at her mouth, laughing wildly.
description: But is she laughing with you? Or at you?

name: Nom
alt: Becca eating a cookie.
description: She does love snack time.

name: Notes
alt: Becca taking notes on a pad of paper.
description: She's always been very studious.

name: Peek
alt: Becca peeking around a corner.
description: Is she shy? Or is she spying on you?

name: Pout
alt: Becca pouting and puffing out her cheeks.
description: She's used to getting her way.

name: Salute
alt: Becca with her hand up to her forehead in a military salute.
description: When the job calls for it, she can take orders.

name: Scared
alt: Becca with her hands on her face, her eyes wide with fear.
description: Whatever she saw is truly scary. Watch out.

name: Shrug
alt: Becca with her hands raised, shrugging her shoulders.
description: She either doesn't know, or doesn't care.

name: Sigh
alt: Becca letting out an audible sigh.
description: She's probably disappointed in you.

name: Sing
alt: Becca holding a microphone, singing her heart out.
description: She can actually carry a tune.

name: Sip
alt: Becca taking a sip of coffee from a purple mug.
description: She needs caffeine to start her day off right.

name: Smile
alt: Becca smiling happily.
description: When she's in a good mood, she smiles a lot.

name: Smug
alt: Becca with her hand on her chin, smiling with a smug expression.
description: Of course she's better than you. She's better than everyone.

name: Snug
alt: Becca wrapped in a pink blanket with hearts on it.
description: When it's cold out, being all comfy under a blanket is the best.

name: Sweat
alt: Becca sweating nervously, with a timid smile.
description: It's rare that she makes a mistake, but she still hates admitting it.

name: Think
alt: Becca with a hand on her chin, deep in thought.
description: Pondering the mysteries of the universe. Or what to have for dinner.

name: This
alt: Becca pointing upwards, in agreement with a previous message.
description: Wow, she actually agreed with you.

name: Thumbs Up
alt: Becca grinning and giving a thumbs up.
description: You've successfully impressed her. Nice work!

name: UWU
alt: Becca making an UwU face.
description: OwO

name: Wink
alt: Becca winking with her tongue stuck out.
description: She's always been flirty. Don't read too much into it.

name: Woah
alt: Becca with her hands on her chin, her eyes wide open in surprise.
description: She is both surprised and impressed.

name: Work
alt: Becca sitting and typing on a computer, her tongue out in concentration.
description: Good luck pulling her away from whatever she is doing.

name: Yawn
alt: Becca yawning.
description: She probably stayed up too late last night.

name: YES
alt: Becca with glowing eyes, her skin red with excitement.
description: Whatever idea she has, there's no stopping her now.

name: Yikes
alt: Becca with a disgusted look on her face.
description: She didn't like that. Not one bit.
